bibdata.abstract: This amendment is based on IEEE Std 802.11&trade;-2007, as amended by IEEE 802.11k-2008, IEEE 802.11r-2008, IEEE P802.11y-2008, IEEE P802.11n D7.0, IEEE P802.11w D6.0, IEEE P802.11p D4.0 and IEEE P802.11z D2.0
